# Straight Up Finance

> Australia's straight-up finance resource. Car, motorbike & boat finance information, guidance, and expert connections.

## About

Straight Up Finance is an Australian finance information and lead generation service covering car, motorbike, and boat finance. We help Australians understand their finance options and connect them with licensed credit representatives.

## Important Notice

Straight Up Finance is NOT a licensed credit provider. We do not hold an Australian Credit Licence (ACL) and do not provide credit assistance or arrange credit. All finance applications are processed through licensed third-party credit representatives.

## Services

- Car Finance Information (new & used, dealer & private sale)
- Motorbike Finance Information (road bikes, dirt bikes, cruisers)
- Boat Finance Information (tinnies, runabouts, cruisers, jet skis)
- Finance Calculators and Educational Resources
- Connection to Licensed Finance Professionals

## Key Features

- Honest, transparent guidance
- Educational finance calculators
- No-obligation interest registration
- Connection to licensed credit representatives
- Australia-wide coverage

## Coverage

We provide information for all Australian states and territories:
- New South Wales
- Victoria
- Queensland
- Western Australia
- South Australia
- Tasmania
- Northern Territory
- ACT

- Hours: Mon-Fri 8am-6pm AWST
